video.title: The Dead Files
video.synopsis: A psychic communicator teams with a retired homicide detective to solve unexplained paranormal phenomena in haunted locations across America.

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve discover the gruesome secrets of a supposedly haunted restaurant in Asbury Park, New Jersey.
episodes.title: The Devil Made Me Do It

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve uncover the murderous past hidden within the walls of a rural New York farmhouse.
episodes.title: Evil in Erieville

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate a historic Central Florida hotel where owners and guests have been tormented by terrifying visions.
episodes.title: Hotel Hell: Ybor City, FL

episodes.synopsis: When a Florida couple claims to see spirits in their home, Amy and Steve uncover a history of unspeakable violent crimes.
episodes.title: Killed by the Klan: Key West

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate claims that a North Carolina home is filled with dolls that are vessels for the dead.
episodes.title: Death and Dolls: Cramerton, NC

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate claims that the spirit of a murdered socialite is haunting a historic Montana home.
episodes.title: Am I Crazy?: Great Falls, MT

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate claims that phantoms have tortured a California family for generations.
episodes.title: Terror in the Shadows: Acampo

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate a terrified mother's claims of strange paranormal activity deep in the heart of Georgia.
episodes.title: Scandal In the South

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate disturbing reports of paranormal activity at a family-owned restaurant in Santaquin, Utah.
episodes.title: Fear at the Family Tree

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate claims that a North Carolina man is being terrorized by a desperate ghost.
episodes.title: A Watery Grave

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate reports of frightening paranormal activity at a community theater in Vancouver, Washington.
episodes.title: Final Curtain Call

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate a frightened grandmother's claims of paranormal activity in her historic Wichita home.
episodes.title: Deadly Attraction: Wichita

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate reports of bizarre paranormal activity at a family's home in Blackshear, Georgia.
episodes.title: Pandora's Box: Blackshear, GA

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate bizarre paranormal sightings at a historic Texas homestead.
episodes.title: Surrounded: Cedar Park, TX

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate reports of paranormal activity at a museum in an old Nevada mining town.
episodes.title: Blood and Gold: Virginia City

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate reports of paranormal encounters at an old Alabama plantation home.
episodes.title: A Widow's Rage

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve investigate Santa Fe's abandoned and infamous New Mexico State Penitentiary.
episodes.title: Death Sentence: Santa Fe, NM

episodes.synopsis: Amy and Steve attempt to help a frightened teen who believes he's opened a portal to evil at his home in Olalla, Washington.
episodes.title: Starvation Heights: Olalla

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate reports of dangerous paranormal activity at a hotel in the remote village of Central, Alaska.
episodes.title: Arctic Wrath

episodes.synopsis: Steve finds evidence of a mysterious death and Amy thinks she's solved a century-old mystery when they investigate ghostly reports at a dental office.
episodes.title: Fatal Attachment: Huntington

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate reports of violent paranormal activity at a restaurant with a dark past in upstate New York.
episodes.title: A Banshee's Cry: Carmel, NY

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity at a newlywed couple's home in the old railroad town of Garrett, Indiana.
episodes.title: Blood on the Tracks: Garrett

episodes.synopsis: A mother of eight says her entire family is being terrorized and asks Steve and Amy to investigate the family home in Parkersburg, West Virginia.
episodes.title: The Soul Collector

episodes.synopsis: Volunteers at an arts center in Clinton, North Carolina, fear it's being haunted by the original owner and ask Steve and Amy to investigate.
episodes.title: The House of Death: Clinton

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate claims of threatening paranormal activity at a bar in Columbus, Ohio, and stumble onto a 100-year-old murder.
episodes.title: Blood in the Bordello: Ohio

episodes.synopsis: When Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity at a farm in rural Illinois, they discover a history of bloodshed, madness and violence.
episodes.title: Family Curse: Belvidere, IL

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate reports of dangerous paranormal activity at a frightened couple's property in Wichita, Kansas.
episodes.title: Deadly Gift: Wichita, KS

episodes.synopsis: At a Seattle restaurant, Steve unearths evidence of a bloody massacre, and Amy encounters disturbing entities that want to harm the living.
episodes.title: Burned Alive: Seattle, WA

episodes.synopsis: At a Colorado home, Steve uncovers evidence of a murder mystery while Amy encounters a poltergeist with harmful intentions.
episodes.title: Tormented: Westminster, CO

episodes.synopsis: Amy believes the dead have their sights set on a family member in a Michigan home where suspected paranormal encounters are ongoing.
episodes.title: Never Alone: Forester, MI

episodes.synopsis: At a Bloomington home, Steve finds evidence of a tragic death while Amy encounters an eerie entity that crawls into bed with the living.
episodes.title: Forgotten: Bloomington, IL

episodes.synopsis: To stop her children from living in fear of their home, a mother asks Steve and Amy to look into reported paranormal activity in her Egg Harbor house.
episodes.title: Betrayed: Egg Harbor, NJ

episodes.synopsis: While Steve uncovers tragic evidence to back up the client's eyewitness accounts, Amy confronts a variety of spirits at a home in North Carolina.
episodes.title: The Beast: Browns Summit, NC

episodes.synopsis: Steve's investigation exposes the vicious massacre of a family, and Amy endures frightening encounters in a terrified mother's Indiana home.
episodes.title: Deadly Grounds: Wabash, IN

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy examine a mother's terrifying claims of paranormal activity at a Rock Island, Illinois, home that used to be owned by a gangster.
episodes.title: Evil Underground: Rock Island

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy head to Watervliet, Michigan, where frightening paranormal activity has transformed a family's dream home into a nightmare.
episodes.title: Possessed: Watervliet, MI

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy travel to a Virginia home that once was a slave plantation and is now being assaulted by horrifying paranormal activity.
episodes.title: Spellbound: Buchanan, VA

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy travel to California's Death Valley to investigate claims that frightening spirits have overrun a local hotel.
episodes.title: Death Valley

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate claims of frightening paranormal activity at a historic hotel in Wyoming that has scared away employees and guests.
episodes.title: Bloodlust: Buffalo, Wyoming

episodes.synopsis: At a California hotel, Steve uncovers evidence that the property was once a mental hospital while Amy encounters numerous vicious entities.
episodes.title: Hotel Nowhere: California

episodes.synopsis: At a family home in Fort Wayne, Indiana, Steve and Amy investigate reports of abusive paranormal activity directed at a woman with a tragic past.
episodes.title: Violated: Fort Wayne, Indiana

episodes.synopsis: When Steve and Amy investigate claims of dangerous paranormal activity at a Michigan home, Steve finds that it was a bloody War of 1812 battle site.
episodes.title: Battlefield: Flint, MI

episodes.synopsis: Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity at a Pennsylvania hotel where employees are scared to come to work and guests won't spend the night.
episodes.title: Lethal Waters: Pennsylvania

episodes.synopsis: At a minister's home in Manchester, Connecticut, Steve unearths a history of violence, and Amy confronts a menacing dark mass that targets the living.
episodes.title: Tortured Souls in Manchester
